mapper.insert: insert into member(id, email, password, name, phone_number, address, enabled, role) values (member_seq.nextval, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, null, 1, #{role})
mapper.select: select id, email, password, name, phone_number, address, enabled, role from member where email = #{email}
select id, email, password, name, phone_number, address, enabled, role from member where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into vericode(id, veri_email, veri_code) values (member_verification_seq.nextval, #{veriEmail}, #{veriCode})
mapper.select: SELECT id, address, name FROM member WHERE role = 'ROLE_CARCENTER'
